title: No free win on promos
body: I was 91 LP S4 and won a game, got message for free win like normal. Played and won another game directly after which should mean I am 2-0 in promos and into S3 but it didn't give me promotion?

replies.body: Hmmmm it looks like you had received a promo helper on an earlier miniseries, and you hadn't actually tried and failed this miniseries which would mean you wouldn't get a [**promo helper**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h2q3) for this one.
